title: Interactive session held for Pakistani students in Luxembourg
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 9 (APP): The Embassy of Pakistan in Belgium on Monday held an interactive session with Pakistani students in Luxembourg who recently arrived there for their studies.
The meeting provided a good opportunity to discuss issues and explore pathways for increasing collaboration, said a press release.
The Embassy joined an interaction with recently arrived  students in . The meeting provided a good opportunity to discuss issues and explore pathways for increasing collaboration. @ForeignOfficePk @PkPublicDiplo pic.twitter.com/O6uhGVWvN1
